title: Dato 3.3.6 – Menu bar calendar & time zones
content: Dato is a replacement for the system menu bar clock.   By default, it looks exactly the same, but when you click it, you get a small calendar, calendar events for the next week, the current time in various time zones (even with custom names), week number, and more. title: TG Pro 2.69 – Control fan speeds, monitor temperatures, and find faulty sensors

title: Ammonite 1.23.1 – Tag visualizer and search utility
